actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide for the prompt election of a Vice President in cases of vacancy in the Office of Vice President by reason of the succession to the Office of President by a Vice President selected under the 25th amendment.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for the prompt election of a Vice President whenever there is a vacancy in the office of the Vice President by reason of the succession to the office of President of a Vice President who was nominated and confirmed under the 25th Amendment.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution to provide for the prompt election of a Vice President in cases of vacancy in the Office of Vice President by reason of the succession to the Office of President by a Vice President selected under the 25th amendment.
